headline: Walgreens Encourages Safe Drug Disposal on National Drug Take Back Day Saturday, April 26, 2025
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., April 25, 2025--Walgreens is calling on the public to help in the fight against prescription drug abuse by participating in National Prescription Drug Take Back Day on Saturday, April 26th, 2025. Drug take-back days are reserved annually for the safe disposal of unwanted, unused, or expired medications. Walgreens has more than 1,500 kiosks across 46 states and Washington, D.C. These kiosks are a convenient way to ensure medications are not accidentally or intentionally misused.
